resources.string: An integer is a palindrome if the reverse of that number is equal to the original number such as 1991 .
Prime numbers are numbers that have only 2 factors: 1 and themselves example 2,3,7,31,73 .
A number is said to be twisted prime if it is a prime number and reverse of the number is also a prime number e.g. 73 ,37 ,43 ,34 .
